text:
Indian equity benchmarks ended little changed on Friday as gains in ONGC, Sun Pharma and Tata Motors were offset by losses in Yes Bank, Bharti Airtel and Reliance Industries.The S&P BSE Sensex was little changed at 33,157 and the NSE Nifty 50 Index fell 0.2 percent to 10,323.The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of NSE Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India, rose 0.18 percent to 10,389 as of 7:45 a.m.





Where will the markets move today?https://t.co/o7qd0l7tLY— BloombergQuint (@BloombergQuint) October 30, 2017
title: Stocks To Watch: ICICI Bank, ONGC, L&T;, Tata Metaliks, Bharat Financial
